product_name: Igloo Super Tough STX-72 Sportsman Cooler - 72 qt.
long_description: The 72 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-72 Sportsman Cooler is built to meet your needs when car camping, fishing or heading to the work site. It'll keep your food cold for up to 5 days in 90F heat.
short_description: The 72 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-72 Sportsman Cooler is built to meet your needs when car camping, fishing or heading to the work site. It'll keep your food cold for up to 5 days in 90F heat.
